channel.title: Html, PhP, or JavaScript Related
channel.description: Is there a way to type up your domain and publish it inside your html docs I really don't want to buy things anymore. After I go to college and get a job... maybe Most likely there isn't a way because there would be so many people without .webs or wix.com/something or .weebly, ect. I bet something might come up Lets just see who answers?

item.title: Html, PhP, or JavaScript Related
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:13, topic:417941”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=520492.msg3786596#msg3786596 date=1318912064]

Why would you want to? Are you trying to get the passwords?

aythor=imsuperman05 link=topic=520492.msg3781220#msg3781220 date=1318478097] He wants to save those accounts into a folder on his computer. So possibly yes.

Lol… I’m making a dreamweaver/Adobe Photoshop website and I want people to be able to log into my website
If its not saved somewhere than they wont be logged in
[/quote]If it’s on a website you should just keep it in mysql… you can use the export/import things if you need to

[quote author=Coelho link=topic=520492.msg3781982#msg3781982 date=1318558620]

I know, I’m just curious as to the reason you would want it would be…

Perhaps having no knowledge of MySQL? At some point, we all thought the data was stored as plain-text in a file or something similar. We didn’t know what else to think because we had no knowledge of it.
[/quote][/quote]What’s your point? I told him what to do if he doesn’t know much about MySQL

[quote=“wildskiller, post:14, topic:417941”]Not related to topic - [size=12pt]Seperated Question[/size]
I stoped doing java programming tutorials at like, just a guess, arrays and I am looking for someone who can do some client and server work with me while I’m going back to java tutorials and mastering it.
Anyone up for it?
I won’t really release anything maybe just give it to the person working with me because I’m
Not really caring so much for my personal rsps but working on it is sooo much fun
and I [size=36pt]LOVE[/size] it

[size=12pt]Another Seperated Question[/size]
How can I dump sprites, cache, and itemdefs from runescape[/quote]There are tools you can use to dump all those, and some that can repack them back in edited

Read full topic

item.title: Html, PhP, or JavaScript Related
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

wildskiller:

How do I make the accounts made on my website go to a file on my computer

Use MySQL.

Warning: DO NOT READ THIS PART IF YOU DON’T WANT BAD HABITS >
Or you could use php’s file functions.
http://php.net/manual/en/function.fopen.php
http://php.net/manual/en/function.fwrite.php
http://php.net/manual/en/function.fread.php
http://php.net/manual/en/function.fclose.php
< Warning: DO NOT READ THIS PART IF YOU DON’T WANT BAD HABITS

Also, USE GOOGLE.

Read full topic

item.title: Html, PhP, or JavaScript Related
item.dc:creator: @synchronized2 synchronized_
item.description:
@synchronized2 wrote:

<html>
<head>
<script type="text/javascript">
function show_alert()
{
alert("I am an alert box!");
}
</script>
</head>
<body>

<input type="button" onclick="show_alert()" value="Show alert box" />

</body>
</html>
  • http://www.w3schools.com/js/js_popup.asp

Read full topic
